verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%>

to the <S%G40>saints<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> [who are] at <S%G2857>Colossae:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

We <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> for you,

since we <S%G191>heard<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints;<s%>

<S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G606>laid<s%> up for you in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> of <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4257>previously<s%> <S%G4257>heard<s%> in the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%>

which has <S%G3918>come<s%> to you, <S%G2531>just<s%> as in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> it is constantly <S%G2592>bearing<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> and <S%G837>increasing,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as [it has been doing] in you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> [of it] and <S%G1921>understood<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth;<s%>

<S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G3129>learned<s%> [it] from <S%G1889>Epaphras,<s%> our <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G4889>fellow<s%> <S%G1249>bond-servant,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> servant of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> on our <S%G5228>behalf,<s%>
and he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1213>informed<s%> us of your <S%G26>love<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> we <S%G191>heard<s%> [of it], we have not <S%G3973>ceased<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> for you and to <S%G154>ask<s%> that you may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of His <S%G2307>will<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G4907>understanding,<s%>

so that you may <S%G4043>walk<s%> in a <S%G516>manner<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> to <S%G699>please<s%> [Him] in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>respects,<s%> <S%G2592>bearing<s%> <S%G2592>fruit<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> and <S%G837>increasing<s%> in the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G1412>strengthened<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2904>might,<s%> for the attaining of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>steadfastness<s%> and <S%G3115>patience;<s%> <S%G5479>joyously<s%>

<S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> who has <S%G2427>qualified<s%> us to <S%G3310>share<s%> in the <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G5457>light.<s%>
For He <S%G4506>delivered<s%> us from the <S%G1849>domain<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> and <S%G3179>transferred<s%> us to the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of His <S%G26>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%>
in <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G629>redemption,<s%> the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
And He is the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G517>invisible<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the first-born of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2937>creation.<s%>

For by Him <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> were <S%G2936>created,<s%> [both] in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> and on <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3707>visible<s%> and <S%G517>invisible,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2963>dominions<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G746>rulers<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1849>authorities<s%> – <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> have been <S%G2936>created<s%> by Him and for Him.
And He is <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and in Him <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G4921>hold<s%> <S%G4921>together.<s%>

He is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> the <S%G1577>church;<s%> and He is the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> the <S%G4409>first-born<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that He <S%G846>Himself<s%> might <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G4409>have<s%> first <S%G4409>place<s%> in <S%G3956>everything.<s%>
For it was the [Father's] <S%G2106>good<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> to <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in Him,

and <S%G1223>through<s%> Him to <S%G604>reconcile<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G846>Himself,<s%> having <S%G1517>made<s%> <S%G1517>peace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of His <S%G4716>cross;<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him, [I say], <S%G1535>whether<s%> things on <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> things in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
And although you were <S%G4218>formerly<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> and <S%G2190>hostile<s%> in <S%G1271>mind,<s%> [engaged] in <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>deeds,<s%>

<S%G1161>yet<s%> He has <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G604>reconciled<s%> you in His <S%G4561>fleshly<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> in order to <S%G3936>present<s%> you <S%G2714>before<s%> Him <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>blameless<s%> and <S%G410>beyond<s%> <S%G410>reproach<s%> –

<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1065>indeed<s%> you <S%G1961>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2311>firmly<s%> <S%G2311>established<s%> and <S%G1476>steadfast,<s%> and not <S%G3334>moved<s%> <S%G3334>away<s%> from the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> that you have <S%G191>heard,<s%> which was <S%G2784>proclaimed<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and of <S%G3739>which<s%> I, <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister.<s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in my <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> for your <S%G5228>sake,<s%> and in my <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I do my <S%G466>share<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of His <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> is the <S%G1577>church<s%>) in <S%G466>filling<s%> up that <S%G5303>which<s%> is <S%G5303>lacking<s%> in Christ's <S%G2347>afflictions.<s%>

Of [this church] I was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3622>stewardship<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> on me for your <S%G1519>benefit,<s%> that I might <S%G4137>fully<s%> <S%G4137>carry<s%> out the [preaching of] the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

[that is,] the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> which has been <S%G613>hidden<s%> from the [past] <S%G165>ages<s%> and <S%G1074>generations;<s%> but has <S%G3568>now<s%> been <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to His <S%G40>saints,<s%>

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>willed<s%> to <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in you, the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

And we <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> Him, <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> and <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> that we may <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5046>complete<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And for <S%G3739>this<s%> purpose <S%G2532>also<s%> I <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G75>striving<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G1411>power,<s%> which <S%G1411>mightily<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> me.
